page.title: 17RECREATION AROUND OSSINGTON.
page.content: { Indoor hobbies}include wine and beer making for home consumption, knitting and sewing, crossword puzzles, card games and other board games. Many people are happy to relax with a book to read or take a leisurely stroll. With the{daily newspapers}and {magazines}comes the opportunity to take part in quizzes and competitions sometimes with a financial incentive. Among the younger generation {computer games}are gaining popularity, both for their entertainment and educational value.{Video recorders allow people to record television programmes automatically for viewing when convenient, and it is also possible to{hire}popular films from a {video library.
